The sad thing is that even if its possible 1 champion can counter than entire comp. Just pick either Malph or Rammus and their is a free loss, bonus if you have Jax in the jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=YCitizenSnipsY,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uvfEdEis,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-04-14T03:21:52.878+0000)

{{champion:57}} is better, just ask Immortals

>The sad thing is

How is that sad? :P If you pick a crippling overspecialized team comp, it only takes one flaw to knock it down.

Whats the point in it being possible if all you have to do is run a single champion to destroy it? Like there are 3 champions off the top of my head that specialize in stacking armor which would fuk this team since corki has the only magic damage. 

Its sounds fun and I guess this is the meme boards, but in reality it nothing special at all even if possible.

Generally it's unhealthy, as least from what I've seen and heard, is for overspecialized team comps to be too effective. If you pick five champions from the same class, who have relatively similar weaknesses, that weakness is going to be cripplilng.

It has its risks and rewards. Pick five ADC's? Lots of kiting and objective control, but hard countered by armor stacking tanks and mobile assassins.

Pick an unbalanced (in the sense that you're not picking a balanced team composition, not that it's OP or UP) team comp, don't expect it to be easy. It's like going against Zed and never buying armor as an immobile mage or whatever simile works here.
note: corki does hybrid damage so if the tanks stack armor corki's ult poke still hurts. Also note that resist-stacked graves can't be bursted, and that all of these guys are gonna have sterak's/maw

Here is the question, if there is 3 champs that would rekt that, why is all AD teams not exactly uncommon right now yet not terrible?

Most teams I see right now are pure AD and even with Malphite or Rammus on the other team, they still lose.
*coughAPAshecough*

> [{quoted}](name=YCitizenSnipsY,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uvfEdEis,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-04-14T03:21:52.878+0000)

Actually Kindred and Corki both would shred them
Kindred doesn't really shred Rammus. Rammus isn't a health-stacker, he's an armor-stacker. Kindred's pretty countered by armor-stacking.

> [{quoted}](name=charcharmunro,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uvfEdEis,comment-id=0002000000020000,timestamp=2016-04-14T13:49:19.281+0000)

Then corki

Ok, he still doesn't feel a thing form the other four memebers on the team. And its not that hard to buy a single MR item. And you still haven't explained how that team is supposed to teamfight. 

And don't tell me kite, you can't kite a home guard TP Rammus, you will be engaged on eventually. Like seriously Rammus jungle and Maokai top and that entire team is usless.

> [{quoted}](name=YCitizenSnipsY,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uvfEdEis,comment-id=000200000002000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-14T23:07:29.443+0000)
>
> Ok, he still doesn't feel a thing form the other four memebers on the team. And its not that hard to buy a single MR item. And you still haven't explained how that team is supposed to teamfight. 
> 
> And don't tell me kite, you can't kite a home guard TP Rammus, you will be engaged on eventually. Like seriously Rammus jungle and Maokai top and that entire team is usless.

You do realize adcs get armor pen, they just have to kill off everyone other than rammus with last whisperer, bloodthirster, and Ruunans hurricane (which Cait also synergies really well with)
Also kiting will be pretty good, unless they position badly, Cait has traps for rammus and Maokai, they all have either cc or dashes/escapes in their kit and if they use all of those with maybe an iceborn gauntlet on maybe 2 or 3 adcs you should be winning

Yeah just ignore the powerball Rammus with a point and click CC that makes you focus him. God forbid he does do a TP engage that team practically wont have time to react. 

You know how much armor pen and damage they would need to be a threat to both a Rammus and Maokai? And what about the rest of that team. As some one else pointed out early in the comments, we have already seen a close attempt to this with IMT's 3 adc comp, and it fell of hilariously bad once Maokai got enough armor.

> [{quoted}](name=YCitizenSnipsY,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uvfEdEis,comment-id=00020000000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-15T01:12:36.185+0000)
>
> Yeah just ignore the powerball Rammus with a point and click CC that makes you focus him. God forbid he does do a TP engage that team practically wont have time to react. 
> 
> You know how much armor pen and damage they would need to be a threat to both a Rammus and Maokai? And what about the rest of that team. As some one else pointed out early in the comments, we have already seen a close attempt to this with IMT's 3 adc comp, and it fell of hilariously bad once Maokai got enough armor.

Rammus can make one person target him for a brief amount of time. There will still be 4 adcs (with graves being able to semi meelee the enemy) to destroy their team. Also Maokai and rammus won't be shiz if the rest of their team is dead which will be possible after your adcs get items

KhmKhm.
My Match history has a word with you.
http://i.imgur.com/N14OyDV.png

Meh, Graves mostly does damage through his spells and Corki does mixed damage, that wouldn't entirely ruin the team. Moreso if they all have Steraks and Maw which gives them tankiness.

Ive seen plenty of Corki's and Graves 1v1 Rammus at any time of the game. Kindred does % damage, replace Cait with Tristana or Kalista and you got massive burst or even more % damage. Ashe is a slow bot. That could actually work.

Also Malphite, idk but most times he is crap. He is never pure tank and always builds some AP which just lets him die fast. I always see Malph get RoA, Abbysal, sometimes even Ludens or Liandrys, and its sad seeing him melt because even with his last items being armor, he has like 2-3k hp and thats it. Not to mention if he misses his ult or it only hits one person, he is basicalyl worthless after.
